Module com.rupizza
Package pizzeria

Class StoreOrder

java.lang.Object
pizzeria.StoreOrder
public class StoreOrder extends Object
StoreOrder class that stores the list of orders placed by user Has a static integer that provides the next available order
Author:
Frances Cortuna
